snippet: Analysts said a recent legal setback pushed the carmaker to enter talks to resolve hundreds of cases over the sudden acceleration of its vehicles.
abstract: Toyota says it will begin negotiations to settle hundreds of pending federal and state lawsuits over sudden acceleration of its vehicles; analysts say decision to reach agreement stems from recent legal setbacks; Toyota Camry's electronic throttle system was found to be defective by Oklahoma jury who said company acted with reckless disregard and is liable for 2005 crash that killed one woman and injured another.
lead_paragraph: Analysts said a recent legal setback pushed the carmaker to enter talks to resolve hundreds of cases over the sudden acceleration of its vehicles.

headline.main: Toyota Seeks a Settlement for Sudden Acceleration Cases
